full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details

*  **Tender Title**: Temporary Help Services Requirement
*  **Tender Reference Number**: cb-7441-1827184
*  **Solicitation Number**: S4563892
*  **Tender Closing Date**: September 26, 2023, at 15:00:00
*  **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: None specified
*  **Contract Category**: Service
*  **Trade Agreements**: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Description

The Department of National Defense's (DND) Temporary Help Services Requirement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) inviting firms to provide temporary help services support.

#### Security Requirements

A minimum security level of Secret is required for resources under this requirement.

#### Eligible Suppliers

This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who have qualified under the following streams and categories: Computer, application support.

#### Proposal Submission

The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. 1019837 Ontario Inc.
2. ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
3. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
4. Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.
5. Cloud Shift Inc.
6. Coradix Technology Consulting Ltd.
7. Integra Networks Corporation
8. Intelan Consulting Inc.
9. Makwa Resourcing Inc. and Koroc Consulting Inc. in JOINT VENTURE
10. MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
11. Newfound Recruiting Corporation
12. T.E.S. Contract Services INC.
13. Tech4soft Inc.
14. TechWind Inc.
15. Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.

#### Attachment

The notice and supporting documents can be downloaded from the following link: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7441/s4563892-method-1-rf--rfp-reissue-%28english-version.pdf

#### Contact Information

 For further information or clarification, please contact:

* CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 613 971-795
